meanings.definition: A plural noun meaning a recess or niche in a building, typically semicircular in shape.
meanings.sent1: The exhedrae in the library provided cozy reading nooks.
meanings.sent2: Architects designed the exhedrae in the museum to showcase sculptures.
meanings.sent3: During the game of hide-and-seek, the exhedrae in the hallway became secret hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an exhedrae, holding memories in its curved walls.
meanings.sent5: The exhedrae of the garden created a peaceful retreat for meditation.
